squeanut index: A list of all the available nutty cards
play: Plays a song in the current voice channel
purge: Mass delete messages in a channel
rage: For when you're at least mildly pissed off
apply: Learn about applying to become a moderator for Nutty Cult
setcoins: Set how many coins someone has
skip: Skip the current song or skip to a specific song
inventory: See all the items you have
use: Use an item and unleash its power
settings: Change bot options for this server
